attributes.action: step in and stop or reduce the bonuses that are due to be awarded to Northern Rock employees on 23/01/2009.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should the staff be rewarded with a bonus, funded, however you choose to look at it, by taxpayers money when said taxpayers themselves have had bonuses withdrawn, jobs at risk and families and friends struggling to keep themselves financially sound.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
